XScalerCoeffBank Struct Reference

#include <xscaler.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The XScalerCoeffBank data structure for loading a Bank in a Coefficient Set, which contains 4 banks.


Public Attributes

u16 SetIndex
s16 * CoeffValueBuf

The number of the phases associated w/ the bank

Coefficient Set Index (0 based).

u16 XScalerCoeffBank::TapNum

The number of the Tap associated w/ the bank
